lead_paragraph: DIAMOND--Henry L. The Open Space Institute mourns the passing of Henry L. Diamond, conservationist and environmentalist. Mr. Diamond leaves behind a an extraordinary legacy in both New York State and nationally, protecting special places and safeguarding the natural environment. John H. Adams, Chairman Kim Elliman, President & CEO Joe Martens, Senior Fellow and former Commissioner, NYS DEC 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DIAMOND, HENRY L
